title: Non-toxic products for cleaning — MB Green Cleaning
description: We source our organic and non-toxic cleaning products. Most important for us the safe for you, your home, and your planet.
cleaned_text: Get Clean MB Green Cleaning makes the health and safety of our clients and employees our No. 1 priority. We source our organic and non-toxic cleaning products from Shaklee, a pioneering purveyor of natural household, nutrition, and beauty products. Healthy Home Safe for you, your home, and your planet. When it comes to keeping your house clean and the Earth safe, you shouldn't have to choose. Get Clean by Shaklee offers nontoxic and natural cleaning choices that are safe, powerful and smart. Learn
